description:
With a luminous career spanning 35 years, Sanjay Divecha has collaborated with
global artists like Angelique Kidjo, Carlos Santana, and Michael McDonald. He
has also worked on award-winning projects, including A.R. Rahman's Oscar-
winning score for 127 Hours and film soundtracks like Woman on Top and Leela.
name: Sanjay Divecha Trio

performer.description: Experience the brilliance of Sanjay Divecha, one of India’s most revered guitarists, as he takes the stage with his trio. A celebrated musician and composer, Sanjay Divecha is a core member of the legendary supergroup Cross Currents, led by Zakir Hussain and featuring icons such as Dave Holland, Chris Potter, Vinnie Colaiuta, and Shankar Mahadevan.
performer.name: Sanjay Divecha
